quote: They ask little, for they know it is little they will receive for all their asking, but what little is so dear, as it always is to the autumn-hearted who know life is pitiful and infinitely sweet.
quote_letters: THEY ASK LITTLE FOR THEY KNOW IT IS LITTLE THEY WILL RECEIVE FOR ALL THEIR ASKING BUT WHAT LITTLE IS SO DEAR AS IT ALWAYS IS TO THE AUTUMN-HEARTED WHO KNOW LIFE IS PITIFUL AND INFINITELY SWEET
